title: Trading Guide
intro: Clients can submit transaction orders online through the provided trading platform. For convenience and to minimize the risk of errors, it is recommended that clients conduct a simulation (demo trading) first before using a real account.

steps.step1_desc: Clients who transact online will receive an official {userid} and {password} from PT. Rifan Financindo Berjangka. These credentials are confidential and used to log in to the trading platform.
